Main.HQ: Headquarters, the main building in Boom Beach that you must protect and upgrade.

Support.sentry: A defensive building in Boom Beach that fires at enemy troops and vehicles.

Defences.sniper tower: The first defensive building you unlock in Boom Beach; basic and reliable.

Economy.resource base: A special base in Boom Beach that contains resources you can collect and defend.

Battle.medkit: An item used to heal troops during battle.

Events.Warships: A special event in Boom Beach where players use Warships to battle others.

Funny.Boom Beach: A game where you build a base and attack other bases.

Miscellaneous.scout: A type of reconnaissance unit used to gather information.
